channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MD
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MD

item.title: Report X-2024031348
item.description:
Report X-2024031348

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-29T18:14:08+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-23
  • City: HAGERSTOWN
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: THE PACKAGE WAS FOUND LEAKING POWDER ON THE UNLOAD TRAILER FROM THE PREVIOUS FACILITY. DescribePack: THE PLASTIC DRUM WAS CRACKED ACROSS THE BOTTOM AND SIDE CAUSING THE CONTENTS TO LEAK OUT. DurationRel: 8 and MitigateEffect: THE PACKAGE WAS PLACED IN A LINED TOTE FOR PROCESSING.

item.title: Report X-2024031049
item.description:
Report X-2024031049

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-29T18:14:08+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-20
  • City: BALTIMORE
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER ARRIVED IN WORK AREA TO FIND A LEAKING HAZMAT (FLAMMABLE) IN THE DMP. RESPONDER DONNED PPE, (GOGGLES, GLOVES, BOOTS AND APRON) AND PREPARED TO RESPOND TO THE SPILL. FOLLOWING DECISION TREE AND RESPONSE SHEETS, CONTAINED THE SPILL AND DECONTAMINATED THE SPILL AREA. ALL WASTE WAS DISPOSED OF THROUGH THE DMP.

item.title: Report X-2024031214
item.description:
Report X-2024031214

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-29T18:14:08+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-19
  • City: HAGERSTOWN
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: THE 5 GALLON PLASTIC DRUM APPEARS TO HAVE BEEN IMPACTED BY A SHARP METAL EDGE. DescribePack: THIS CAUSED A SMALL CRACK AROUND THE BOTTOM EDGE CAUSING THE CONTENTS TO SLOWLY LEAK OUT. DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: THE PACKAGE WAS PLACED IN A LINED TOTE FOR PROCESSING. LOOSE ABSORBENT WAS USED TO CLEAN THE SPILL.
